channel.title: Can't Connect!
channel.description:
I can't connect to my server through my no-ip address only my local host 127.0.0.1, Is this normal? Things i've done Port forward the port 43594 That's about it. Would it have something to do with my firewall? Or Avg. More info. System - Windows 7 64 bit. Anti Virus - Avg Internet Secruity Fire Wall - Windows FireWall Client using - RuneWing, Tried moparscape client and silab Source using - Runewing, Tried different sources
Oh and if you could try to connect my server is Purekiller.no-ip.org

item.title: Can't Connect!
item.dc:creator: @jabezxa jabezxa
item.description:
@jabezxa wrote:

oh serious? can you try connecting? Purekiller.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Connect!
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

The hoster is supposed to connect via localhost.
Not the Dynamic Address.

Read full topic
